Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Chat's been quiet lately...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: This is so unusual. They may not talk for a day, but not talking for two weeks?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: They haven't even answered my private messages. Much less the ones I sent in the chat.

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: It couldn't be... they grew tired of me? Right?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Shit. What am I even thinking? If only they at least sent a message...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Hm? What is this doing here? A paper on my nightstand? Did my mother leave this here?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: An invitation to a Library?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: (Even if I did want to go, I wouldn't be able to. My body... is too weak to even get out of this house without needing serious help from my mother.)

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: (Thinking about it, did mother leave this here? But... she couldn't have, she hasn't come into my room today. And I for sure know this wasn't here when I woke up.)

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Let me see... what else is in this Invitation...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: What... what is... G□□va□□i and J□□n'□ name doing here...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Why are their names in here? What else is written on this damn piece of paper!?!?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: My life? If I risk my life... I can get back my friends? Were they kidnapped or something??? But... how would I...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: With this stagnant body of mine, that is slowly but surely leading me to my death. How am I? Supposed to save them...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Why the hell am I even thinking about this?... How am I HESITATING!?!?!?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: DO I VALUE OUR FRIENDSHIP SO LITTLE!?!?!?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: AM I SERIOUSLY GIVING UP WITHOUT EVEN TRYING???

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: AFTER SUFFERING WITH THIS SUFFOCATING BODY OF MINE THAT IS THREATENED BY A MEASLY COLD!!!

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: DO I REALLY HAVE ANYTHING TO LOSE??? DO I SERIOUSLY HAVE ANYTHING MORE VALUABLE THAN THE FRIENDS THAT HAVE BEEN WITH ME FOR SO LONG????

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: GET UP!!!

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: BODY OF MINE THAT REFUSES TO DO ANYTHING FOR ME! THAT HAS HELD ME BACK FOR MY WHOLE LIFETIME!!!

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: GET THE FUCK UP AND ALLOW ME TO DO SOMETHING BY MYSELF FOR ONCE!!!

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: I don't have any weapons... not even my parents possess anything akin to either a gun or a sword...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: This... yeah... this will suffice...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Just sign here?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Teleportation? Is this... W Corp's doing?

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: ... What am I thinking? Even if it was... I can't do anything about it...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: If only that obsessed lunatic G□□va□□i was here, always obsessed with stars. If he were here he might know what the Library is...

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: Enough thinking... I'll do this... I won't only do this. I'll overcome ANY OBSTACLE IN MY WAY AND SAVE THOSE TWO!!!

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: NO MATTER WHAT!!!

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: I'LL DO IT!

Dialog.Title: The Eclosing
Dialog.Content: I'll sacrifice even my life if it's necessary. I'LL DO IT!!!!
